import React, { useEffect, useState, Component } from "react"; import Category from "../Category"; import Cart from "./Cart"; import { Outlet } from "react-router-dom" import Loading from "../Loading/Loading"; import { render } from "@testing-library/react"; class Filter extends Component() { render() { const [openTab, setOpenTab] = useState(1); const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const getPosts = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const respone = await fetch("https://fakestoreapi.com/products"); const data = await respone.json(); setPosts(data) setLoading(false) } catch (error) { setLoading(false) console.log(error) } } useEffect(() => { getPosts(); }, []); if (loading) { return ( ) } return (
{ posts.map((post, idx) => { return (
) }) }
) } } export default Filter
